exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : poly A0 eqA ltM P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H0 : ~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a P) Unable to unify "RO (?M2228 ++ nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os ?M2227 ?M2228 :: nil) ?M2228" with "RO (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a P) P) P".

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : poly A0 eqA ltM P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H0 : ~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a P) Unable to unify "~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a P)" with "RO (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a P) P) P".

original: intros a P H0. apply RO0. apply H0.
